content:
Langsam from Bielsko-Biala and Indonesia



Subject:  langsam family 
From:  Chava Malka Cooper <5803207@gmail.com> 
Date:  Mon, May 04, 2015 5:08 am 
To:  moishe@langsam.com 
  
hi! i saw on the Jewish Genealogy Surname Database that you are looking for Langsams. 
my grandfather was George Langsam, born in Indonesia in 1928. his parents were Moritz Langsam, 
born in Bielsko-Biala, and Rosa Lien Rapaport, born in Indonesia.
Moritz's parents were Pinkus Langsam and Salomea Posner. 
do you think there is any connection? i don't have any more names, and very few dates, 
which i can't look up right now because i have a problem with my computer.

thanks!

Chava Malka Cooper
Architectural Engineer
Israel
 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Subject:  RE: langsam family 
From:  moishe@langsam.com 
Date:  Sat, Jun 27, 2015 8:09 pm 
To:  "Chava Malka Cooper" <5803207@gmail.com> 
 
Hi,
 
Thank you for your inquiry. I do not always read this email box, so I do apologize for the delay.
I do not see an obvious connection, do you have dates of birth/passing for Pinchus Langsam and Salomea Posner? What about their other kids or siblings to Pinchas? 
 
Did you see my website?

 
Moishe Miller
Brooklyn, NY
 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Subject:  Re: langsam family 
From:  Chava Malka Cooper <5803207@gmail.com> 
Date:  Sat, Jun 27, 2015 8:56 pm 
To:  moishe@langsam.com 
Attach:  george langsam.jpg  
 
all that i know:

Moritz Moshe Langsam
born November 17th,1898 Bielsko-Biala, Poland
died April 22nd, 1955 Bandung, Indonesia

Parents: Pinkus Langsam born Bielsko Biala
Mother: Salomea Posner, died 15/11/1924

At least i think that's what it says. I'm attaching the source, my grandfather's baby book.

Chava Malka Cooper
Architectural Engineer
054-848-6244
 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA
